text: Cat owners were required to be at least 18 years of age , be the primary caregiver of the cat , be able to monitor the frequency of vomiting and / or diarrhea , and be able to report the daily occurrences via a daily automated phone call from an Interactive Voice Response System ( IVRS ) . Cats from multi - cat households ( up to four cats maximum ) could be included , but only one cat was eligible to participate in the study and all cats in the house - hold were required to be fed the same study diet . Additionally , the owner had to be able to monitor the frequency and occurrence of vomiting and / or diarrhea from the cat participating in the study .
